data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kubik, Stepan, Bartak, Miroslav (2018): A new species of Gaurax from the Czech Republic (Diptera, Chloropidae). ZooKeys 803: 131-140, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.803.29706, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.803.29706
